summary: The document is a classified routing and record sheet detailing the debriefing of James B. Wilcott Jr. following his resignation from KUBARK (a cryptonym for the CIA) to pursue employment in the private sector. It outlines his employment history with KUBARK, including assignments under various covers such as ODIBEX and JMOCEAN, and provides instructions for handling future inquiries about his employment with ODYOKE. Additionally, it mentions the preparation and forwarding of his resume for private sector employment, which was done with the approval of JMWAVE's Chief/Finance and Chief/Cover.
key_findings: James B. Wilcott Jr. resigned from KUBARK (CIA) to seek private industry employment.
His employment history includes assignments under ODIBEX and JMOCEAN covers.
Instructions were given for how to handle inquiries about his ODYOKE employment in the future.
A resume for private sector employment was prepared and forwarded, with approval from JMWAVE's finance and cover chiefs.
